scripts.build-dev: cd backend/tracker && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile -t ericdang/tracker:dev --build-arg BUILD_ENVIRONMENT=dev .
scripts.build-prod: cd backend/tracker && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile -t ericdang/tracker:prod --build-arg BUILD_ENVIRONMENT=production .
scripts.dev: cd backend/tracker && telepresence intercept tracker --port 5000 -- uvicorn config.asgi:application --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000 --reload
scripts.test: source scripts/env.sh && cd backend/tracker && pytest -m unit
